opcsim: Simulating Optical Particle Counters¶


opcsim is a Python library for simulating the response of low-cost optical particle counters (OPC’s) to various aerosol distributions to better understand the sources of error and limitations of these devices. It provides an easy-to-use API for building simple OPC models as well as model and visualize aerosol distributions.

For a brief introduction to the ideas behind the package, you can read the introduction here.

To view the source code or report a bug, please visit the github repository.

  • Model OPCs
  • Visualize Aerosol Distributions
